/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sun is shining brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, interspersed with trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars of different colors are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
